Blog.post: I kind of plan on staying up all day today. I would like to get my sleeping schedule back on track. school's not too far ahead and I'm slacking. it wouldn't be a surprise to myself if I said, "oh, well, I'll be okay," and took a nice ten hour nap.

I believe that I become more and more selfish each and every day. I feel like crap when I go into a store and I see things I want and realize that they're things that I might not be able to have. I get this hateful feeling inside and my heart begins to burn. I can't stand looking at those girls who take their mother into the stores and have them buy over two-hundred dollars of clothes at one shot and then go to another store to buy other crap. I wish I could have grown up like that! I wish I could have things and be "happy."

I didn't sleep very well last night. I would only be half-asleep-half-awake the whole night and my ears would pound. it was even hard to lie down. I can't stand it. I want you here with your arms around me whispering, "poor thing." I want your kisses and your fingertips all over my skin. I want your face pressed up on mine. I want you. you you you. I'm lonely without you and I feel nothing without you. I want to know you're right beside me and if I turned my head I could see that calm look on your face. I want everything.

every day, I find myself growing more and more afraid of things. I think it's mostly life in general that scares me. I can't seem to win and I can't seem to escape the losing sensation. it's so hard to try with all of yourself when it's hard to even open your eyes when the clock reads 3 p.m. I don't know what keeps me up at night and I don't know what keeps me in my bed during the day. I need something, anything. I need the feeling of accomplishment. I need to know that I can still love and I can still be loved without a problem. I need more of you.
I attemped to go running tonight, but it's completely dark outside. I'm guessing the moon is in its dark or there are a little too many clouds. frown.
my mom is such a butthole. ugh ugh ugh. I wish more than anything that I can control my own actions and she would be out of my freaking life. she's just in the way.
school isn't so bad. I almost like being nearly alone in every class.

it's the last day of summer vacation. goodness gracious, it went by so fast! I had an incredible time this summer, I must say. I spent it with the boy who makes my heart race, and I read a lot of good books. it's nice to get to know yourself and find out who you are. too bad I listened to an odd amount of avril lavigne. :]
too much on my mind. I need to sleep.
